item.title: #13 - Weed
item.description: The Question: Do you feel safe?. The Topic: I promise I’m not stoned. The Viewermail: Too much sand?

item.title: #13 - Weed
item.description: the_question Do you feel safe? Important question to think about. Safety is foundational for humans. I feel incredibly safe. Physically. Emotionally. Slightly worried about job security, as well as the future. the_topic Weed I remember I 1st smoked weed when I was 18 or 19. Then it progressively became a habit and throughout uni, I was getting blazed pretty often. For like the 1st year of uni it was like, once a week.
